channel.title: [Help?] My Project (Network-Scape)
channel.description:
I have posted some previous Threads about my work etc. And I have come across some problems... I am using AllStar's Source as apparently it's the easiest Source to use for Newbies like me. Here are some of the problems: [IMG]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad155/daniel1644/RSPS1.jpg[/img] Here's another: [IMG]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad155/daniel1644/RSPS2.png[/img] And the final one: [IMG]http://i931.photobucket.com/albums/ad155/daniel1644/RSPS3.png[/img]
As you can see there are a few problems like "null" objects and I don't know what file to edit to change "AllStar Scape" and stuff. Also when you log-in the banner at the top says "All-Star Scape"; what file do I edit?? I have changed most of the AllStar stuff via client.java, server.java, GUI.java and some NPC handler. Thanks. ---------------------------------------------------------- I maybe OK now, I am just going through EVERY file to change the AllStar stuff.

item.title: [Help?] My Project (Network-Scape)
item.dc:creator: @daniel1644 daniel1644
item.description:
@daniel1644 wrote:

OK thanks man, I’m new at this so I’m not that good
I’ll get better when time passes by
What Client shall I use!?

Read full topic

Aha… Allstar ain’t good man. And basically everything is in the client class.
